column2: if you do nothing else at the AI...you have to go down to the Thorne rooms.  I had never heard of this before and it's possibly my most favorite room in the entire city.  This exhibit is full of dozens of miniature rooms
column3: decorated from a variety of periods of interior design and architecture.  They're incredible and I never even knew they were down there.  It's a history lesson via design with rooms from Europe (France
column5: and Germany) and American rooms.  They look like dollhouse rooms but the level of detail is both fascinating and remarkable.  I could've stayed down there all day.  You HAVE to check that out.
